H0.text: The number of cars produced has decreased as a result of using interchangeable parts in car manufacturing.

H1.text: The need for custom manufacturing has increased as a result of the use of interchangeable parts in car manufacturing.

H2.text: The efficiency of manufacturing plants has increased as a result of using interchangeable parts in car manufacturing.

H3.text: The number of countries producing cars has decreased as a result of the use of interchangeable parts in car manufacturing.

A4.text: The concept of interchangeability was crucial to the introduction of the assembly line at the beginning of the 20th century.

A5.text: One such part can freely replace another, without any custom fitting, such as filing.
